channel.title: Speeding weapons up ? :s
channel.description: Well i tried to speed the weapons up (fr33sc4p3 source) no matter what i change the delays to, the weapon wont get faster/slower do i have to change something else es the delays ? :s

item.title: Speeding weapons up ? :s
item.dc:creator: @NojTB NojTB
item.description:
@NojTB wrote:

public boolean AttackNPC() { int EnemyX = server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].absX; int EnemyY = server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].absY; int EnemyHP = server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].HP; int hitDiff = 0; int Npchitdiff = 0; int wepdelay = 0; CalculateMaxHit(); hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit);

i found that do i edit that?
and what would it do if i edit this one?[br][size=1]Posted on: May 24, 2007, 03:24:06 PM[/size][hr]wow no wonder all my wepons hit so fast.
testscape only has about 30 wepons with this

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 864) { hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(2); PkingDelay = 4; wepdelay = 4; inCombat(); setAnimation(393); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; deleteArrows(playerEquipment[playerWeapon], playerWeapon, 1); }

im guessing i have to make one for all the wepons to set there delay eh. sheesh sounds like about 5 days work lmao…[br][size=1]Posted on: May 24, 2007, 03:43:32 PM[/size][hr]nvm the answer si wrong. wrong wrong wrong wrong wrong wrong wrong…
i put it my own for longswords and swords. then compiled no errors and theres still no delay in teh wepons i added. wrongy wrong wrong wrong.

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 667 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 686 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1277 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1279 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1281 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1283 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1285 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1287 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1289 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 6605 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7758 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7806) //swords { hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(2); PkingDelay = 6; wepdelay = 6; inCombat(); setAnimation(393); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; deleteArrows(playerEquipment[playerWeapon], playerWeapon, 1); } else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1291 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1293 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1295 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1297 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1299 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1301 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1303 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 6607 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 6897) // Longswords { hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(2); PkingDelay = 7; wepdelay = 7; inCombat(); setAnimation(393); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; deleteArrows(playerEquipment[playerWeapon], playerWeapon, 1); } else
Code /|

item.title: Speeding weapons up ? :s
item.dc:creator: @evildoom evildoom
item.description:
@evildoom wrote:

well thanks for the answer but i said the speed wont change no matther what the delays is

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4151)) // whip { PkingDelay = 1; wepdelay = 1; resetanim = 1; }

10 = 1 second right ?
my whip should attack so fast that it would show 2-3hits but it only hits like every 5 seconds lol

Read full topic

item.title: Speeding weapons up ? :s
item.dc:creator: @Slivion Slivion
item.description:
@Slivion wrote:

[center][i]It’s not hard, but for some it can be.
You need to change the delay time.

Go into your client.
Hold ctrl and f.
Search for.

Wepdelay

And

Pkdelay

Then change the times to a higher for slow.
Change the times to a lower for fast.[/i][/center]

Read full topic
